## Import.ImporterFilesystem.getChildren() method

Gets the children of the given directory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getChildren(absolutePath: string): Result<IImporterFsEntry[]>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

absolutePath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

the absolute path of the directory.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IImporterFsEntry](./ts-res.import.iimporterfsentry.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

`Success` with the children if successful, `Failure` with an error message if not.

## Remarks

This method does not recurse into subdirectories and ignores '.' and '..' as well as any non-file or directory entries.
